item.description:
For More Info Click Here

Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

"Networking Extravaganza!"


Bring your deals, bring your business cards, bring your comfortable shoes! You'll want to speak to as many people as possible in this all-evening networking event. And we'll make sure we identify the people you want and need to speak to at the beginning of the evening, so you don't miss anyone who can help you build your business!

5:30 - 6:15 PM - POWER HOUR - Meet Board Member THAN MERRILL of A&E's "Flip this House"! - Than will talk about his favorite subject: Marketing techniques to make your business soar!
This special Power Hour is for Members Of Boston AREIA only! Members only! Members only!

***Please note that members of this meetup are not automaticall members of Boston AREIA - please visit http://www.bostonarei... to learn about becoming a member.

6:30 PM - Meeting - an entire evening of networking - and Than will stick around after the Power Hour for the networking meeting to answer your questions, so don't miss this super networking event!

Location: Best Western, 380 Winter Street, Waltham, MA
Free to members, Visitors only $25 at the door.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association May Meetup
